name: Mundo4J - I18N Property Editor
short_description: Mundo4J is a GUI to manage Java(TM) property files for message internationalization. The 1st release provide a Swing interface, in the future a Eclipse plugin too. Mundo4J keep files synchronized, all with same keys, with no repeating entries.
